import React, {useEffect, useState} from 'react' import axios from "axios"; import c from './Orders.module.css' import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; export const Orders = () => { const [order, setOrder] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { axios.get('http://localhost:4000/api/receipt/').then(res => setOrder(res.data)) }) const deleteHandler = async (id) => { await axios.delete(`http://localhost:4000/api/receipt/${id}`) const newOrder = order.filter(order => order._id === id) setOrder(newOrder) } return (
